info.name: Therapist Dashboard API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete collection of 67 therapist dashboard endpoints for testing.

Before using:
1. Set the {{base_url}} variable (e.g., https://server.innersparkafrica.us or http://localhost:8000)
2. Set {{therapist_id}} to your test therapist ID (e.g., 52863268761)
3. Set {{x_api_key}} to your x-api-key header value

All requests automatically include x-api-key header.

request.description: Get overview statistics for therapist dashboard including appointments, clients, messages, and groups
Get complete therapist profile with professional details and statistics

formdata.value: Learn practical coping strategies for managing anxiety in daily life

body.raw:
{
  "therapist_id": {{therapist_id}},
  "name": "Depression Support Circle",
  "description": "A safe space for sharing experiences and supporting each other",
  "category": "mental_health",
  "privacy": "private",
  "maxMembers": 20,
  "icon": "psychology"
}

exec: // x-api-key header is automatically added from collection variables

variable.description: x-api-key header value (JWT token for API authentication)
Optional: JWT Bearer token if also required
